So far so good.UPDATE: the claimed that the rear camera was scratched on my returned phone (it wasn't) and then sent me a phone with a battery that dies at 20% (does not hold charge for long) - also a little glitchy. Buyer beware

The iPhone is in perfect condition and work like a new one.Battery 85% and face recognition works perfectly.I’m from Argentina and my carrier (which is Personal) works perfect.Nothing negative to say, i’m very happy with my orden

column1: Speaker broken twice / the third was good
column2: I bought an iPhone Xs and the speaker was broken. I send it back and bought another one ... and again the speaker is broken !!!I RECOMMEND THAT YOU CHECK EVERYONE'S SPEAKERS. (The iphone looked perfectly on the outside).----I bought it again.... and it was finally good (the third time)

column1: Face ID doesn't work but, front face camera works
column2: After 1 year, the face ID function has stopped working however, the front face camera works.

Phone works fine, but the claim “looks like new” is a joke. I tried twice ordering from the same seller and the condition was worse the 2nd time. Covered in scratches and battery life depleted to 86%. Sad, irritating experience and sellers route of recourse was to call a phone number that responded “mailbox full”. Save yourself the frustration and order a phone directly from Apple.

Works like a charm. Face recognition works. I’ve had it for about a month I think. The battery life is only 72% though.Update after 5 months it started with the top Right portion of my screen not working. Now the screen touches stuff on its own and glitches and some parts of the screen doesn’t always work.Update it’s Jan 2022 I have already had to change the screen.and it sometimes turns off while you’re using it. The battery life goes kinda quickly.

Siri doesn’t always recognize what I say, I can’t transfer files from my computer simply by dragging and dropping, it’s the whole complicated iTunes thing. The battery is so weak. No headphone jack. It’s so complicated. Everything is so complicated on this phone. The only good things about the phone are the processor and the camera.
I loves it iPhone x Is to use

If you compare the price/quality ratio with other refurbished services such as Apple, you'll get a great value for what you're paying. However I don't really know what refurbished is to them, since my screen had a little black dot in the upper left corner. It really doesn't bother me, specially for the price I paid, but the seller should warn customers this can happen, and not sell it as a renewed phone.

Item came in a very good condition for which I was happy with apparently I noticed small dent within the back camera. Picture taking shows a small black image from the camera.Then came the major issue, Screen. Few hours after using the phone, the screen started going white, freezing bad color display sometimes and ghost touch. The phone could have been a great purchase if not for the screen. One can always try his/her luck when buying a used product. Thanks

This was listed as refurbished. The screen was not even replaced. There is a glass screen protector over old screen. I originally thought that the lines on the screen were just hairs or scratches from previous use. I pulled the screen protector off to check and they are actually cracks in the screen. I understand scratches from use, but I am not the type of person to have cracks on my screen, even from refurbishment. I would not recommend this seller.

Received a Japanese version of the phone rather than the advertised US version and the seller was quick to fix the problem and send me a new one free of charge. Great customer service to fix the issue
Minor scratch in screen but nothing to be worried, battery life at 95%, good phone so far

The reasoning for a mediocre rating is due to the guaranteed at least 80% advertising that is false, I received my phone with less, and that is what damaged the review, otherwise it is a great phone, even in 2022 it is worth getting at the price 3.2 is my actual rating fix the false advertising, it would’ve been a 4 without this issue.

column1: Will need a new battery soon
column2: The phone looks brand new but the battery life is terrible and facial recognition does not work. Will not purchase a refurbished phone again.

El teléfono no tuvo un buen funcionamiento de micrófono y duración de batería. Al ser refurbished claramente no va a estar Perfecto, pero no justifica el gasto vs el performance. Sale mejor comprar nuevo
Overall i am pleased with this purchase. Just a few noticeable scratches, and the battery life isn't the the best but it gets me through most of the day with medium usage.

column1: Poor "renewal" process if any at all
column2: When I opened the box, first thing I noticed was this phone had a screen protector installed (poorly I might add, with bubles in it). How did that pass inspection? More importantly, upon turning the phone on, the first thing it said was "this is not a genuine Apple battery." Again, how did this phone pass the renewal inspection? Lastly and not that important but there was no SIM card key to open the SIM card slot. If I weren't immediately returning this device I wouldn't have any way to open it up and use it. Don't waste your time!
Face Recognition works perfectly fine and so does the battery I checked and it’sat %99 battery life and I did notice there some scrapes and scratches on the top right of the screen
El artículo llego en buenas condiciones estéticas pero no funciona el face id y la pantalla tiene flashes y cambia de color. No funciona correctamente

The day I received this phone it didn’t want to hold a charge and it was getting extremely hot. After doing a factory reset multiple times and shutting it off to charge over night, it finally started working without it over heating and losing battery. I’m pretty pleased with it thus far.

It’s great phone for the money your into an IPhone X without spending that much money for the newest iPhone 11. Phone came in great condition, however, battery life kinda sucks, 90%, but if you giving it to someone or you don’t use your phone all day long, it doesn’t matter in the long run. I recommend this product for the money.

Phone came defective. We drove 4 hours (back and fourth) to an apple store to be told its defective and there's no warrantee. Rediculous. Missed a day of work and hours of aggravation and at the end still no phone. Uhg. Totally not impressed. I cannot recommend enough staying FAR away from this item. Apple said its a common issue with this phone and they offered nothing. They said it would cost more than the price of the phone to fix it.

Phone came with a free black case and screen protector witch was nice! But I received my phone and it has two little small cracks/scratches on the right corner. I’ll have to take pictures and post them along later when I get a chance. But they are noticeable.
The phone is functional, looks like the screen had been replaced atleast once, body had a lot of surface scratches and battery is at 82% life, just above the minimum 80% for Apple.
I was pleased with this purchase, battery health (85%), no scratches; overall it is a very good refurbished iPhone from refoned.
Good, 86% battery capacity, works well. Came on time, and with a charger. Battery was kind of low when i opened it, but not that big a deal.

The phone had visiblescratches.For the past two days the phone has been acting very strangely, it would jump from app to app. We took the phone to be fixed, we were told the screen was bad. They attempted to replace it but were unable because one of the screws was bad and washed, which means this phone has been opened and fixed with non genuine parts.Very disappointed

I hate that I have to review this negatively by the phone stopped working within two days. The back glass of the phone and the camera had obviously been tampered with. There are chips in the middle of the phone where it looks like they opened it and didn’t seal it properly or at all. There is a large gap on the edge of the camera. It looks like they took the phone apart and reassembled it very Messily. The camera is foggy and the screen won’t turn on. I am assuming that this is from moisture getting in the faulty seal.

My phone was damaged it was cracked so I was going to return it then decided to keep it by just putting a screen protector and a case on it to eliminate the retuning hassle. But the phone is defective the battery gets hot while charging and then the Bluetooth is connected to my car it’s a lot of static and it disconnects my Bluetooth on its own andddd when the phone rings the first ring is loud then it goes low ♀ . GETTING A REFUND

Terrible quality.The first iPhone has issues with screen freezing (looks like a broken screen with colors splattered all over the screen).On the second iPhone the screen goes dark.These guys probably take damaged iPhones and replace the screens and batteries with cheap Chinese imitations. Terrible experience with Amazon Renewed.The positive ratings were probably purchased by the company.

column1: Was sent a phone with a broken lightning port!
column2: Everything on this refurbished device is fine except for the lightning port. Taking a look in the port it seems that one of the pins has been disconnected. I have no ability to transfer data from itunes, or using something like a razer kishi controller. There is also no option to get product support so I seem to be SOL on getting a replacement.

Phone is in ok condition it sais it was completely unlocked , but unfortunately its not compatible to Xfinity Mobile network in US, Called the customer care reg the same and they said they can't help except to return the phone .
Loved it , battery level was at 89 sadly an phone had a minor small scratch but other then that it is good .
Very nice product 84% battery life. Very light and minimal scratches around the edge of screen can’t even tell when phone is on so far very happy with both phones
I love the fact that it arrive fast and would off love the battery lofe to be a little better but overall a grate phone

Phone worked well for about 3 weeks before it would start overheating and would freeze when trying to make calls making the phone inaccessible without a force shut down. The battery life is laughable. On a good day it’ll make it 4-5 hours before it’s below 10% and this is with the phone mostly being idle in my purse. The facial recognition is touch and go. With no makeup and my hair up it works but when my hairs down or I have makeup on it won’t recognize me. The corners of the screen won’t always register my touch and I find myself often haven’t to tap twice on something in order for the screen to Register I’m tapping something and this is without the usage of a screen protector. I Overall regret buying this phone and wish I hadn’t wasted so much money. Buyers beware.

El estado general del equipo es muy bueno, tiene pocos rayones, la pantalla esta en perfecto estado, tiene rayones leves en las esquinas, la batería está al 80%No incluyó cargador, cable de poder ni tampoco auriculares

After phone glitches and shuts itself off, the battery would show practically 0% and stay that way until it decides to return to normal, by which the real battery % would show back up and the error message would disappear.Seller offered replacement free of charge and were helpful, better luck next time I suppose.

Overall very disappointed in my purchase and sad to have to write this review. Will probably be returning.

I bought a renewed iPhone X from BuySpry for $569.98 in January of 2020, and in May of 2020, it suddenly shorted out while I was on a bike ride and listening to a podcast. It was in my moderately sweaty clothes, but it's supposed to be waterproof. Bubbles came out from behind the screen when I pushed on it, and it obviously was not waterproof. After drying it out in a bag of rice and trying all the classic tricks to restart it, it won't turn on again. I'm furious. Five months of use for $569.98????
I was so scared to buy a refurbished iphone but I ended up doing it and it arrive in perfect condition, not a scratch or anything! I’m very happy thanks!

There was something wrong with the screen on this phone, almost like ghost touch with random apps wildly opening even though I was not touching the screen. This was evident almost immediately after setting up the phone. I installed the most current Apple update/IOS version available but that did not help. Then I noticed what looks like burn marks on the phone. They can be seen to the right along the edge in this photo - much more visible in person but perhaps this has something to do with the glitchy screen problem. Woot could use better quality control checks before shipping out damaged refurbished phones. I requested a refund the day after receiving this unusable item and they accepted my request. I am still waiting for my refund, though, and the phone was received on Monday (today is Wednesday). I went ahead and bought a new iPhone 11 directly from Apple with warranty, accessories, etc. and it was cheaper than buying a refurbished 11 on Amazon.. just be careful and if you buy refurbished on Amazon just go with ChubbiesTech seller. They sell good used phones based on a recent experience with a family member's purchase. I do not recommend Woot.

The phone is physically in great condition with just two small scratches in the bezel of the phone so it doesn’t bother me. Battery life it a bit lower than what I had anticipated but still plenty good. I’ll make sure to update this review after the 90 day return policy but so far, Not bad at all!

DO NOT BUY FROM WOOT! You Can Read All Of The Positive Reviews You'd Like, But Every One Of These Phones Will Eventually Break. They Provide Little To NO Customer Service And Hesitate When You Ask Them For A Full Refund. The Phone I Purchased Worked Fine For Three Months Until It Began Boot-Looping, Overheating, Dropping Calls & Not Charging. I Sent My Device To Apple For A Hands On Inspection, They Determined The Device Was Refurbished With Very Poor Quality Components, Missing Screws And Fasteners, It No Longer Had Any Water Resistant Sealing, And The Lithium-Ion Battery Was Inspected & Proven Dangerous, As It Could Catch Fire If Heated Enough. All In All, I DEFINITELY DO NOT RECCOMEND Buying Any Refurbished Apple Device From Woot! Or It's Affiliates At Amazon. As a Final Comment, Woot! Will Scam You, They Do Not Want You To Return Their Devices So They Don't Lose Money. Be Safe, And Research Other Sellers If you Are Set On Buying A Refurbished Apple Device.

I am extremely disappointed with the product. 5 months after purchase and the display is not working. I have two friends who have bought their phones from here and they were happy with it. That is why i decided to also go here to buy a new phone. However, I regret not taking the negative reviews into consideration before buying a refurbished iPhone. First off I realized soon after receiving my iPhone XS that it would heat up pretty quickly and become pretty hot. It bugged me because I spent 670 dollars after tax and I felt that after spending that amount it should have worked optimally. I regret not returning right then and there, but I brushed it off because I felt that I was being to picky and it wouldn't be a big deal. A couple months in my screen randomly went completely white. I tried rebooting it and accidentally called 911 twice. I couldn't cancel the call because the screen wasn't showing. Anyways after sometime the screen went back to normal except a very small portion in the upper left corner where the battery percentage shows was completely black. It did not affect my usage since it was a small part of the screen so I just continued on with it like that. I was just happy the phone turned on. Fast forward to now the entire screen is black. I thought my phone had died so I put it on the charger to no avail. I can tell the phone is on. Hey Siri worked but the frickin screen is black. So take heed to this review if you are thinking about purchasing. I feel frustrated and unlucky that the phone I happened to get was so janky.

column1: I lost $330. It heated up for no reason and died permanently  at 5 months
column2: Bought in March, so July was when 90 day warranty was up. It is now August. In the morning, the phone said it wouldn't charge because water was detected in the phone. Phone had not been near any water so assumed it was an error, it continued working fine throughout the day. Then when I was driving, the phone turned off. After a few mins, it got so hot you couldn't even touch it, completing frying the phone. It hasn't turned on since no matter how much I charge it or put it in rice overnight to get the supposed water out. $330 down the drain.

Overall the phone works great, came with a battery health of 87% which it still is, and is way better and long lasting than my 6s I upgraded from. There were no dents or scratches only some really minor glue spots around the back camera and some dirt in the crevices. This was a great upgrade and I would purchase from here again because the quality is good and the price is right!EDIT!!! the phone got stuck in a bootloop right after the warranty ended and ended up being hardware failure. The seller would not accept a return even though the phone was broken because it was after warranty and I was finally able to contact amazon support and issue a refund. I was hopeful at first but ended up being a waste of time and money and would not purchase again. Be wary.

So I was happy about having the phone in late January 2021 but now, May 2021 pretty much the same thing happened: my phone was at low battery and i forgot to charge it so it died but even when charging it for days and switching to a new charger, it never opened again. Both times, my phones were in perfect condition, not even a scratch. There was no reason for them to die like this. Im very disappointed. Don’t buy from this seller

When making or receiving a phone call it sounds very statically and unable to hear my son also it drops the calls unexpectedly,we tried different phones and same result so we came to the conclusion is the speaker and microphone issue in the iphone XS. OnlyWhen using airpods it works fine. I'm dissatisfied with Fiesta Renew customer service I emailed them addressing this issue and they replied suggesting resetting phone, which we did but didn't resolve issue. I emailed them again and I have not heard from them. This is the reason they get one star. I will update this review as soon as I get some assistance in fixing this issue.

The volume buttons are still not working, and now the power/side button doesn’t work either. I contacted the sellers and they said they would not send a replacement, even tho I mentioned that this broken device that they sold me is the only device I have that I can use for communication, navigation, my job, basically everything in my life. The logical board was gone after 4 months of using this phone. So basically I have to get a new phone; the board would cost me the full price of a brand new phone + time, nerves consumed and service fees. Where can I add that I lost almost all my data (it didn’t upload in cloud).Those refurbished phones are “fixed” to pass the 3-months period. Soon after those 3-months have passed, the product stops working and you cannot return/get refund, you have no warranty for it. It’s the worst deal ever for the consumer. I’m disappointed in myself and frustrated for this choice I’ve done.Do yourself a favor and buy a brand new phone. You’ll end up saving more money, nerves and avoid loosing your data.

column1: Easily the best deal ever for an iPhone
column2:
Full disclosure.. I got mine from AT&T but Amazon knows I have spent thousands with them.
A lot of initial noise about the screen not being OLED or HD but honestly the screen is just fine. Images are crisp. The battery life is quite decent and charges quickly. Face ID is really good. No home button but you really don't miss it. I am trading up to the iPhone 13 Pro using my XR as a trade-in. AT&T shipped out the phone two days ago and it's arriving tomorrow.I feel like I am betraying a friend... This is how solid the XR really is. You can't really go wrong.. I just traded up because AT&T was allowing for a great trade-in value. Since this is the only way I can keep buying up into the next generation, every two to three years I trade up again.This is a great phone. Everything about it is solid. You will be happy with it. Just do get a good screen protector and case. These phones will lose value if they get all dinged up... unless you are going to keep it for ever... but regardless... do you really want a dinged up phone?Also take care to check the battery health.. It is insettings. Quoting Apple "Apple considers any iPhone with a battery capacity of 80% or above to be in optimal condition." I have to say if I received a phone with a battery in the low 80s I would make a stink.. but that's just me.

column1: The phone constantly reboots itself every 2-3 minutes or so. Defective
column2: When I received the phone initially, there were few scruffles on the edges. No visible scratches on the screen or on back. So far so good. When I turned on the phone and started to set it up, after a few minutes it automatically rebooted. I didn't think much of it and went ahead to finish setting up, only for the phone to restart 5-6 times until set up was done. I finally set it up, bit frustrated, thought of looking at comments, where many initially had few problems until the suggest force-restart. I did that, and even now, every time I wanna use the phone, I have to either turn it on because it's already powered off or enter the passcode, as, "iPhone requires a passcode after restart".Now, within hours of holding this phone, I decided to finally return it as, 1) "It restarted while I was on a video conference", 2) "When I was on phone calls", 3) "I was installing apps and it rebooted".They mention that "This product is not Apple certified, but has been professionally inspected and tested by Amazon-qualified suppliers. The product may have minimal scratches or dents, and a battery with at least 80% capacity. Box may be generic and accessories may not be original, but will be compatible and fully functional."So did you deliberately send me a defunct product?Boy, to worse it off, the return isn't free. Prepare to lose even more money.
Wish i could give them 6!!!! POSITIVE Experience

I got this phone when I was over fixing the screen of my old phone and I was expecting something to be wrong with it. It's been about a month now and Still nothing wrong! Everything is perfect from the screen down to the charging port and functions. It came in another box but I don't mind

Ok I got a space gray iPhone XS with 256GB and I was happy to get it, it came in a odd box but I didn’t really care about that I got the phone and there are dings and scratch’s on The outer metal case of the phone and I can tell that I he front glass and LCD scream were replaced be the screen kinda drags the image like on a old computer we’re the image stays for a second, that was one thing I wasannoyed about that but the second thing was that it sound like the bottom speaker was broken at one point and they bought another one but it is a really cheap speaker because at certain points it has a pitch of sound with it and it just doesn’t sound good the speaker next to the Face ID camera works perfectly just the one at the bottom of the phone is really bad me personally I don’t care if it has dings or scratch’s on the outer Metal frame of the phone it just really annoys me when they replace the speaker with a bad one and that they get a cheaper LCD screen just to save a little bit of money I mostly notice the bad cream when I’m scrolling on instagram, Twitter or YouTube it’s when you are scrolling that it is the most noticeable problem wouldn’t buy again if I new they replaced parts with bad ones also battery gets kinda worm/hot when charging or on FaceTime and sometimes just randomly but that may just happen when running powerful or changing so that may just be normal not to sure but the battery stays charged all day so not too worried about the battery

After an extremely frustrating experience in with Apple Support during the COVID crisis.I was told that the Power Up issue with my iPhone XS was a failed Logic Board (this took 7 days, several calls, chats).This phone was 18 months old and had no problems leading up to the "failure".Yesterday, Apple Support posted on my Repair webpage that it was not the battery and I had to replace my XS, I was not told the new diagnosis (it seemed very much like Support was instructed not the explain the diagnosis) just that the Phone must be replaced.I did not get the Logic Board failure explanation until I spoke/chatted with not less than 5 Apple Support people in at least 3 countries.I finally got a nice duo based in OK would were honest and frankly not rude (weird for Apple which in the past has always had polite Support people).While failed Logic board was the diagnosis, the way this was handled and the fact that Apple has stopped selling iPhone XS makes me believe that the Phone had bad Logic Boards from the beginning and Apple made a financial and marketing decision not to make this public and simply discontinue sales of the Phone rather than make it part of the Exchange and Repair Extension Programs.Since Apple has stopped selling the Phone XS, I feel obligated to let people know that I believe that the Logic Boards were faulty from the beginning and Apple's quality control may be failing.I elected not to purchase the replacement and I will use my old 7 until I have confidence that Apple is not selling inferior tech.

I had iPhone XS and it was my first iPhone. For the first two months it worked fine. The problems started with iOS updates. The first update didn't install and some apps stopped working. After the support people fixed it, the phone started to shut down on its own. The next update turned the phone into a brick. When I tried to turn it on, it would display that "Connect to iTunes" picture. At the Apple store the technician magically revived the phone using a new update but the very next day the phone started to drop wifi connection. I think the phone had serious hardware problems but Apple engineers figured out how to partially overcome the problems through software tricks. This is how Apple avoids replacing a bad phone with a new one. I ended up paying for an upgrade.

column1: This phone is like a brand new phone!
column2: I received this phone yesterday and it was awesome! Everything works fine as it should.

column1: Update error "4013" renders almost flawless iphone unusable
column2: Let me explain the one starI am an Apple iphone fan (or was)with my spouse and kids also owning different iPhone models. I have owned pretty much every model of iPhone since the very first one.This issue I am listing here has happened to me with 3 of the models I have owned, iphone 5s, iphone 6s and now to iphone xs (did not upgrade to 11 yet)The one-star rating does not reflect the performance or aesthetics which is all the best when it comes to iPhone.The part I am frustrated is the reliability which I am going to try and explain here.I hope someone in Apple pays attention to this, since I have seen several other posts in forums where other are complaining as well.In summary the iphone xs randomly failed to start up after an update and this is not the first model I am seeing this issue.I left the phone charged one night and the message indicated that update will be auto deployed.Woke up in the morning and I was unable to restart the phone. The start process ends up with the sign indicating asking the phone to be connected to itunes for restore. Connecting to itunes and trying to update or even worst case restore from backup will fail with error code “4013”Now I am into IT myself and am fairly handy with this process so as suggested by the instructions for “4013” error I have updated the itunes, updated the laptop computer, used a different and even new cable and tried this update process in all 6 laptop/desktop I have at my place.None of these solves the error.Called up Apple support and indicated this happened after an update process. The person walks you through all the steps which you have already done and indicates this will have to be shipped back to Apple and for a price of almost new phone they can repair it.The phone itself is little more than a year….. so out of Apple warranty and I don not have extended warranty. I paid the full price for this approx.. $1250 for the 256GB version which now sits as a piece of metal with no use. Even worst all data I had since last backup is lost.This is the third time over the years this issue happens where the iphone stops working after an update. All these phones look flawless with no issues and almost brand new, so I wonder why Apple pushes updates and takes no responsibility when they cause the phone to stop working.I was an ardent Apple fan to date and this has made me and family think twice before investing in future iphones.- Victor

So the iPhone itself is great, vendor did a great job. 3 stars is for Apple. We bought this specifically to address connectivity issues my daughter had with her Dexcom CGM and iPhone 7+. Newer phone did nothing to resolve. Apple says "we dunno, maybe reset the phone?" and Dexcom says it doesn't know. Basically a BT clusterf@ck that no one wants to own. Not sure why an App gets approved (a medical device App!) that only works sometimes. Forums (Apple and Dexcom) yield about 40-50% success reports. Most have just given up.Sorry for the rant.Seller was great.

It looks like the seller took a belt sander to the screen before they shipped it. Not only that, they hid it with a cheap screen protector too, as if I wouldn't pull it off the second I opened the package. I expected some minor scratches, but this is ridiculous. If you look closely, there are two decent sized chips in the screen too that distort the pixels behind it.They literally ship the lowest grade they possibly can. The minimum battery health they're allowed to ship is 80%. They gave me one at 81%. Do not buy refurbished from Amazon. Buy refurbished from Apple.My seller was "Tech Exchangee" (yes, with the poor spelling), so steer clear of them.

The phone has a very visible scratch on the screen, despite being listed as "like new, excellent condition." I'm not as bothered by that as I am the faulty charging port. I didn't even realize it until a month after I got it, because I had been charging it wirelessly. But when I was in my car, I decided to plug it in and found that it will charge for a second and then the lightning cable just falls out of the port. I tried a bunch of different chargers and it's all the same. They all fit snugly in my old phone, so it's definitely this one that's the problem. I probably won't be buying Amazon renewed again. As a first time purchaser, this leaves a very bad impression.

The phone arrived in timely manner, great condtion although there is a small whats looks like a key scratch! Its not deep just a surface scratch and barely noticeable, loved the experience of the renewed item. Battery helth is 82% which is good for the price, i like the fact that there is a wall charger, cable, sim ejecter and screen protector comes on the box, very happy with the purchase .

The phone I got came in near perfect condition! It had over 90% battery life and barely any cosmetic damage. It really was like new condition. I had it for two days and it worked and sounded good the colors were so nice. I was upgradingfrom a 7plus and it was a huge difference! I did return it ONLY because it was smaller than what I thought it would be. I wanted the same size as my 7plus. It was just a little smaller width wise than the 7plus. I almost hated to send it back because it came perfectly. Returning took a few days and I reached out to the seller and they responded so fast! They processed my refund and I got it back a few hours later. They are really on it! And I appreciate that.they were easy to work with.If they had a xs max I would definitely buy it from them.

I unplugged my phone at 8:12PM and writing this review at 8:43 my battery is already down to 91% overall can’t complain for the price. Personally next time I’d rather just buy new.

column1: Ask what is checked or replaced
column2: iPhone came in excellent condition with battery max capacity at 86%, this is a 2 1/2 year old phone so Amazon does promise at least 80% battery life. One issue that I did come against was when I took this iPhone straight to the apple store to replace battery and in taking it to them it was discovered that a screw located internally was stripped. So replacing the battery wasn’t even an option. Amazon does guarantee that their products are throughly checked and inspected to look and run like new and that was a clear misconception. I’m still pleased with my phone. I do wish I could’ve gotten the battery replacement. Apple couldn’t proceed with replacing the battery only option was keeping or paying for replacement. Now with keeping this phone I wonder if i accidentally crack my screen will that screw give me issue later down the road with changing whatever is broken?

Great value at $350. Had an Apple store replace the battery for $70, it came with 84% capacity. Even had a nice screen protector on it already! Definitely a better phone than the new iPhone SE 5G. Yeah it’s 4G LTE which is just okay but the cameras are excellent and it is smaller better hand feel than the new bigger iPhones.

The phone appeared unused. The battery is perfect. The AT&T store told me it was an antique and my old phone that they cloned with this one, was a dinosaur. Works great. I could care less about having the newest and greatest phone. This one goes all day and still has 89% of battery left. I am completely satisfied with it.

I am guilty of writing bad reviews on items that disappoint.This one did NOT disappoint!!This phone has excellent screen quality, super fast processor, and a battery that lasts.I unplugged it around 9am, installed some apps, played some YouTube and Netflix videos, let it sit, around 2pm I checked it and still had 88% battery.My old phone would have been dead by then.I realize on “renewed” phones there is a greater likelihood something could be wrong with it.But I lucked out!I am very pleased.

To start off, the box it came in wasn’t anything special. It alone doesn’t effect my review, but it was pretty disappointing nonetheless. You get a charger and charging box with it, and no other accessories aside from the iPhone itself. I didn’t have any scruffs and to start off the phone was very impressive. I noticed my battery had gone down tremendously and that’s where the problem lies. I was on my phone for 1 hour and 30 minutes, (this is total time on the phone as I just opened it) where I spent time downloading and making personal changes. As going through things in settings, I came across battery life. My iPhone 6s Plus I had used for a year, (about 6 hours a day of use) has a current battery life of 93%. This supposedly new iPhone XS, has 88% battery life. This means it’s been used for well over a year by another user, and has run out of life. I think I’m lucky to have not received scratches because this was terrible. I would not have made the purchase if I saw this. I’m going to be sending the phone back and looking at something worth while.

column1: Can You Hear Me Now? NO

I bought the XS Gold, 64GB, AT&T unlocked. Absolutely no issues so far.Battery life at 100% which shocked me being a refurbished phoneNo scratches or scuffs on the sides or screen. Couldn’t believe that as well. (Will add better pictures soon of edges phone currently in case)Paid $375 shipped to my door in less than a week. (February 15, 2021)The Screen quality is a beautiful display with The OLED really showing the colors, and the response time from the operating system is incredible.Face Recognition compared to my girlfriend’s IPhone X is quicker but not by anything that would make a difference, however opening large apps I notice the XS is slightly faster.I’d say spend the extra $50-$75 in today’s market to buy the XS instead of the X. 4GB of ram instead of 3GB, Camera Stutter features, etc..I would recommend if you are hesitant to buy refurbished, do it. This is my 3rd refurbished phone and every single one from the 5GS, 6S, and now this XS have been as perfect as my family’s Plan-bought phones.Packaging was basic but effective!My only complaint so far is the charger brick and charger are pretty cheap, I’ll be buying a regular charger from Apple.Overall 10/10. I’ll be updating this review in a month, 6months and year.

I am transitioning backward from my stolen iphone pro 12 :’( to xs and will list out some pros and cons from the experience
Cons first:- it took a while to install all the apps when setting up. Probably about 1-2hours to complete setup of all the apps with a few reboots because the installation wasn’t initiating. it took less than 30 min for pro 12- my battery max capacity is at 84%. Maybe it could be put in the list of ‘pro’s but well, it does seem to drain faster than newer phones. For less than $400 I guess it could still be a steal- heats up pretty badly when charging but I’ve experienced this with newer phones as well..- bit of delay in typing, noticing as I’m typing this review I have to continuously retype a few characters and mistypes ‘a’ with a period? but it is really irritating every time I type ‘a’ I have to backspace and try few more times.- freezing apps - like uber/messaging apps when trying to make a callPros:- externally close to impeccable, even came with a screen protector!- I don’t experience tooo much slowness/delay using the phone other than sometimes freezing apps <10x/day- I love the design of xs compared to 12 pro- screen quality is not so differentiable from my human eyes comparing to 12 pro- exchange/return period of 90 days-if I find ‘a’ keyboard issue uncompromisable I could return within 90 days for exchange. This is really a decent amount of time for at least to try out- supports esim!Anyway I am loving my phone so far except for a few things like keyboard issue (pretty major), battery capacity, and not supporting 5g as xs model.. we’ll see how this goes I might stillrequest for an exchange or refund if these issues really come to unbearable in the next few weeks..Unfortunately despite how much I wanted to love this beautiful phone, I have returned it and got a different refurbished phone (different generation). I still think it was a good to have tried out, as I’ve had issues with new iPhone xs phone that I got years back where it continuously heated up, auto rebooted until it ran out of battery, and had to get replaced as well. And now having had problems with multiple iphone xs’, it may be the problem with hardware when it got built. This xs phone I returned also had screen issues (ghost typing/not recognizing my typing) and continued to get worse and started to try self deleting my apps or liking/disliking posts/youtube videos, etc. but really great to have long return guarantee period. It was a beautiful phone…

So I ordered the iPhone XS unlocked and overall I have no complaints about the phone itself. It is in great condition, has no scratches or marks, battery at 85%, and works well. My sim card was recognized and works (I have safelink wireless which is the Obama phone lol nad its through Tracfone which I think is through Tmobile) The only issue I have is that I can't create an Apple ID because it says too many IDs have been created on this phone. My apple ID is attached to an old phone number from years ago and it is gonna take 10-14 days to verify my new number since I no longer have access to that device or number. So I would suggest verifying a new number ahead of time if you have the same issue. I cant use the app store, facetime, iMessage, or anything so it sucks, but I will update my review once I get that all in order. All in all, I recommend this phone, great purchase and worth every penny!
**EDIT** so I realized I could create an Apple ID on my computer then sign in on my phone with it until my other ID verifies.I did, however, have issues with iMessage and FaceTime being verified.I spoke with apple and Apparently since this phone has had multiple numbers, they marked my phone number as spam. They were able to fix it in a single phone call. Hope this helps someone.

This phone has reached beyond my expectations! It arrived fairly quickly (within 4 days) and it showed up in mint condition. I have tracfone, so it was an easy switch with the SIM card from my iPhone 6s. I recommend this buyer, I’m so happy with my purchase! Especially for the great price.

column1: Poor screen replacement done on phone.

The battery capacity is 88% but it drains a little faster than id like even with low power mode especially considering the price. The screen isnt the original apple screen which I wouldn't mind as long as it was a decent replacement and maybe OLED? the connectors might have an issue because the screen glitches and blacks out while the phone is on. Also no sim tool provided and the sim tray was sorta stuck in the phone. Not terrible overall but im not thrilled considering the price.

column1: It almost like new, except the battery
column2: This is my second time I tried renewed.The first one was iPad Pro that really, really like unused item.I don't expect that high when I buy this. As a phone it is hard to believe people don't actually use it and then sell it.Come out it is kind of what I expected. The phone itself is almost perfect, the screen, no scratch. If you don't check you will gonna believe it is an opened new phone. It comes with usb cable and iphone charger, both look like the original things.The only, really problem is the battery.I got my one at health 81%.Almost reached the unacceptable margin.There are somethings I can work around it. I upgrade from my dying 6s+ so even in 81% in this Xs, the battery is "still last much longer".Change battery is a regular running cost nowadays.So it this is not acceptable to you, stay away from renewed, especially for the stuff that people actually use, like phone.

The phone is in perfect condition.Included generic cable and charger were usable but I would invest in better and faster charger.Definitely a very worthwhile transaction.
I was scared to buy it but when it came in everything was perfect and it came two days early
Everything was perfect

This review is somewhat preliminary, as I still have to register the phone with a provider to actually make voice calls and send texts. Visually, the phone is in perfect condition, with no observable defects. Delivery was 3 days ahead of the original projected date. Packaging was nice, with the charger and SIM card tool included. I was able to transfer the data from the old phone via Bluetooth link as part of the setup routine, although it took four attempts to complete the process. The jury is still out on the facial recognition feature and the battery condition/life. So far, so good!

I purchased an iphone and am disappointed with the result. I did receive everything I was supposed to. But there's two big scraches on the top right corner of the screen, I was under the impression that there was "little to no cosmetic damage" on all amazon certified referbishes. There were minor scrapes/scratches on the sides that I understood would be there, but I don't think a restored phone should come with a broken screen. i tried to contact the costumer service email the was provided with my package, and got a response saying that their emails are "unsafe" to use so I have to go through Amazon to get this fixed.
Good Product. Arrived with somes little Damages. But very Good condition. Battery health with 84%

Got this phone from refoned, the phone looked nothing but new. The battery health was 86% and came with a okay adapter and decent quality cable. There’s not even speck of scratch or dent on the phone. It works flawless.
Excelente compra, no tengo queja del producto recibido. Cero detalles, recomendado.Totalmente liberado.
El producto está en buenas condiciones tal cual se indica en la publicación.
Fast delivery. I Phone in great condition.
Couldn’t be more pleased.Just like a new phone, no scratches or issues and saved $200.Battery life has improved a bunch from my iPhone SE.
The phone is immaculate it looks brand new it connected to AT&T prepaid by simply adding the Sim card no problems absolutely love it shipping time is the only downfall it took 6 days
I had got my iPhone 4 weeks ago And it’s very excellent

Absolutely love this phone. Keep in mind this phone is USED. Mine has a few scratches... it’s cool. Love it. Battery health is at 85 percent which is ehhhhh but most reviews will tell you that. It’s $300/400 range for a flagship 1000 phone 2years ago. Buy it
Overall a great phone! It was like it was brand new :)) I definitely recommend
Looks and works great like it’s brand new. Battery life is 94%. Came with a screen protector already on it, and there isn’t a single scratch. Well worth the money.

The wall port is a knockoff brand. Wouldn't recommend depending on the seller.As for the battery life of the phone, its states 87% in the battery section of settings.
The phone is in great condition battery life 86% (expected more but its ok) ,body and screen in great condition. It came with a charger , a sim card removal and a screen protector.

Okay, so at first I was a little hesitant about buying a renewed Phone. I have the worst luck ever and just knew that I was going to be the one that got the crap one. My phone actually came in a couple of days faster than expected and I was super excited! I opened the box, it came with a charger and the thing to get the sims card out with. The phone itself looked perfect! Literally, it looks brand spankin new! I was so excited! I plugged the phone up and turned it on. It took FOREVER to update I was getting BEYOND impatient lol! It FINALLY finished updating and setting up and it was time for a test drive. This phone works perfectly! I honestly don’t have anything to complain about! I love it!

This is the first time I’ve ever bought a refurbished phone, and I was very satisfied. Fully unlocked so I could keep my number, came super fast, the phone is in near brand new condition. The only thing that I didn’t give a 5 star rating was the battery life, and it still got 4 stars because the phones battery capacity is at 87% not full capacity but still have yet to need to charge my phone more than the regular overnight charge even though I use it all day. Strongly recommend this product.

I love my new iPhone and all of the features it has, as well as the amount of storage it is equipped with. Shipping was fast, arrived within 2 days. column1: Phone came in with like new conditions with no issues.
column2: Upon unboxing of the phone, it appeared to be clean and scratch less. phone had 92% battery capacity and everything work well as if it was new. the box also came with the charger and a sim tool which made the transition to the new phone easier. I was definitely a bit nervous on getting a renewed phone off amazon however my experience was very positive and I would definitely recommend.
Great quality,works perfectly.

This phone arrived in amazing condition, not a single scratch. The battery arrived at 87% which isn’t terrible but isn’t amazing, but was expected. BUY THIS PHONE YOU WONT REGRET IT. Took it like a week to get here though.
Like a new phone
Phone doesn’t work with setup. Trying to update iCloud settings and it just goes right back to the Hello screen. This was a gift for my daughter so she is obviously super upset and disappointed.

column1: GREAT PRODUCT DELIVERED IN PERFECT CONDITION
column2: This phone arrived well packed and in perfect condition.It is like new.It was easy to set up and immediately logged onto my carrier (T-Mobile) as soon as I put in the SIM card.The battery health was and is at 95% and I charge it on one of several wireless charging stands.Battery life has not been an issue for me at all.I am not a huge fan of face recognition, however.Highly recommend this phone and the vendor.
I love how great the phone works! Especially the clear camera views and Animoji’s are exactly what I predicted. I highly recommend this product and the new ones (iPhone).
I was very happy with this product. It looks and performs like it's brand new. This company does a great job.
Perfect the best no excuse
Pretty much everything is in perfect condition, the battery life is slightly lowered in the “battery health” settings but that’s expected over time
Great Value for the money

Honestly was expecting a phone that would have minor scratches or dents but the phone was like new! For the price that I paid, it was definitely worth it! The battery health was almost 100%, both cameras fully functioning, the phone obviously fully functioning, and the person who sent it also threw on a tempered glass screen protector! So thankful for that! Would definitely recommend ordering this!

I got this as a second phone to use as a GPS navigation tool on my BMW motorcycle. All I need are wifi and App Store capabilities, so it will not be set up on any cellular network.Nevertheless, I believe the phone would work as well as any other iPhone on a cellular network.Cosmetically, the phone looks brand new.Not a mark on it.The battery capacity is 84%, in line with the advertised feature of 80%.An adequate charger and cable were included, again as advertised.

column1: Pague 10mil por un iPhone XS prácticamente nuevo
column2: Pague 10mil pesos por prácticamente un iPhone XS nuevoEl celular vino sin ningún detalleDespués de la compra tuve un poco de miedo de que me llegara un equipo roto o un jugo haha pero quede sorprendidoTodo funciona al 100%Recomiendo a este vendedor

Como varios comentarios dicen, es cosa de suerte. Anteriormente tuve que devolver un iPhone XS, ya que a pesar de que todo iba y lucía buen, el Face ID no funcionaba. Volví a adquirir esta vez el mismo dispositivo y funciona al 100%. La única pega que tendría sería que la batería esta al 84%, pero por lo que te ahorras en comprarlo nuevo es bastante aceptable.Todavía falta probarlo más pero hasta ahora va bien.

Me espere un buen tiempo para dar mi opinión, se lo compre a mi hijo y la verdad me llego como nuevo, fue una súper compra. $13500 y ciento que lo compre como nuevo, sin ningún detalle, la pila al 100% y a tres meses de su compra todo funciona perfecto.Excelente iPhone

column1: Prompt service & phone was immaculate description accurate
column2: Love the produce, exactly as advertised would use this seller again.

column1: Perfecto, igual a nuevo, bateria al 100% de vida, cero detalles , cero rayones !COMO NUEVO!
column2: Excelente equipo no tiene ninguna falla llego rapidisimo en 1 dia.No viene con accesorios ni caja originales pero el equipo esta impecable y desbloqueado para cualquier compaia

Me gustó por qué hasta el momento no he tenido problema alguno y llegó en perfectas condiciones. Pero lean la descripción, viene en caja genérica junto con el cargador genérico y batería mínimo con el 80% de su condición. Me llegó con una mica protectora de pantalla se agradece bastante. Todo bien por el momento, llevo 3 días con él y todo en orden, recuerden registrar su producto para la garantía

definitivamente uno ve tantos comentarios sobre este tipo de productos reacondicionados que duda. pero llegue a la conclusión que depende totalmente del proveedor o a quien se le compre. me imagino que hay mucho proveedor que abusa con la mala calidad del producto. es decir existe proveedores responsables y otros no. También agrégale algo a la suerte.En mi caso ya le he comprado 3 teléfonos a este proveedor BuySPRY y los tres teléfonos han estado como nuevos sin ningún defecto, y en este caso en particular no fue la excepción sin ninguna raya y la batería en un 90%. tengo tres días utilizándolo y todo prefecto.Como de costumbre AMAZON perfecto en entrega a tiempo y todo.

Did not like the way the deal began with this seller but we got it solved with proper communication. The phone was just as advertised actually better than I thought it would. Very impressive product. 99% battery life and not even a minor imperfection can be seen anywhere on the phone. I would definitely deal with these guys again minus the customer service issues.

iPhone XS con estética 10/10, Batería 100% aun, todo funcional con las piezas originales, podría recomendar a"WirelessWarehouse USA" que fue la empresa con la que lo adquirí.El celular viene con una caja genérica no muy estética pero lo que cuenta es el celular , un cargador y un cable certificados.Muy satisfecho con la compra.

El teléfono llegó en perfecto estado, con un cargador, llave para la SIM y una tarjeta con un código QR para comunicarme con el comprador en caso de ser necesario. No tiene ninguna raya, ni en pantalla ni en el vidrio de atrás. La batería está al 84%, pero la duración de la carga es como si tuviera 90% (la batería de mi iPhone anterior duraba mucho menos estando en el mismo porcentaje). Sólo tiene un pequeo "defecto": a veces la pantalla no responde en el borde derecho, cuando quiero escribir la p o la , por ejemplo, pero no es un gran problema porque después de un rato funciona de nuevo (o puedo girar la pantalla). En definitiva, una gran compra.

A ver, hay que leer bien la descripción, se trata de un producto reacondicionado que podría tener algunos detallitos. en mi caso cumplio al 100% lo que dice en la descripción y excedió mis expectativas. el teléfono se ve como nuevo, no trae ningun detalle y fuera de la capacidad de batería que no es nueva, no te darías cuenta de que se trata de un teléfono usado.Los accesorios genéricos funcionan de maravilla y viniendo del mundo iphone a estas alturas ya tengo muchos cables y cargadores.Así que el veredicto es 100 por 100 recomendable el ahorro contra uno nuevo fue más de un 30% y no siento ninguna diferencia

The package came early, the Iphone worked as it should. Although I was a little underwhelmed by the lack of contents on the inside. I thought I was scammed at first by the lack of design on the box and contents. It was just a blank box with a charging cable and the phone itself. Not quite the satisfying unboxing experience but my main focus was the iphone which worked great for me.
Function 10/10Battery 9.5/10Looks 9.5/10For the price 11/10Overall 9.85/10

column1: Great quality and no visible damage
column2: I was a doubtful at first and I did not want to purchase a refurbished product due to generally mixed reviews but I am very happy with this product and I’ve been using for about a month, it arrived on time and as soon as I opened it I checked for any visible damage or used marks. There are none at all.Got it from seller “Big Box LLC”It didn’t arrive with the original iPhone box as expected but it came with what seems to be its original cable and wall plug, which surprised me, I was expecting a generic accessory.The battery life quality is at 80% as expected and the phone was properly factory reset, there was no iCloud lock or anything.I already put a screen protector as seen in the picture and it runs smoothly.Great and noticeable generational jump from an iPhone 7, totally recommend it.

Esperé 3 meses para escribir una resea de este Iphone, y después de usarlo mucho en ese periodo puedo recomendarlo al 100%. Estéticamente llegó casi perfecto, venía con algunos rayones casi imperceptibles en la pantalla. La batería me llegó al 86% de capacidad y no ha disminuido después de estos 3 meses de uso, funciona perfecto!Muy contento con mi compra :)

column1: Funciona muy bien, como nuevo pero el cargador mal
column2: Llegó muy bien, como nuevo prácticamente, algunos detalles casi invisibles. Ha funcionado muy bien desde hace como mes y medio que lo compré. No se apaga, no tiene problemas de ningún tipo. Siento que hice una muy buena compra en cuanto al celular. Lo malo fue el cargador. Tuve que cambiarlo porque desde que se conectaba constantemente marcaba error de conexión. Siento que le afectó un poco a la batería porque primero marcaba 97% de la condición de la batería y después de algunos días de usar el cargador que me mandaron bajó a 95%. Lo dejé de usar.

so far so good. delivery a day early, phone in great condition and as ordered/described. seems in perfect condition and no visible wear or scratches. battery charges to 100% and so far no bugs showing up. thx guy, i am happy i gave you another chance.

column1: Tenía mis dudas, pero todo perfecto!
column2: La verdad es que había pedido uno con otro vendedor y tuve algunos problemas con el equipo. Al hacer la devolución, decidí cambiar de vendedor (ahora con mobo) y todo perfecto! Llegó al otro día, venía con su cargador y cubito. Estética 9.5/10(siendo 10 completamente nuevo). Ya con su mica y funda, no hay ningún detalle visible de uso. Todo le funciona perfectamente y viene liberado.Gran opción por un gran precio.

column1: Importante saber a que vendedores comprar telefonos renewed
column2: Este es el 3er teléfono renewed que compre en un lapso de un mes, el primero se descompuso al 3er dia, el segundo tenia un defecto en el touch, en ambos casos me reembolsaron, pedi otro iphone vendido por MOBO Mexico, y esta en muy buenas condiciones y al parecer su criterios de control de calidad son mas estrictos, se nota desde como viene empacado, asi que recomiendo comprar un iphone renewed, pero hay que fijarse en las calificaciones de los vendedores.

Hay muchas cosas por decir respecto al teléfono celular. Como a la mayoría de gente, el IPhone XS venía en una caja genérica junto a un cargador no original. Dejando eso de lado, el teléfono supero ampliamente mis expectativas. No todos los compradores tienen esta suerte, pero parece ser que al menos con esta empresa suelen ser más las buenas que las malas. El teléfono venía con 100% de capacidad de batería, sin ningún tipo de rayón, y básicamente en estado de nuevo. Las bocinas funcionan perfectamente, las cámaras también, y el rendimiento es como de teléfono recién salido de fábrica. Desbloqueado para usar con cualquier operador, y sin ningún problema de cuentas de apple o similares. Es cierto, comprarlo renovado no es para todos. Siempre se recomendará comprar el teléfono nuevo cuando la posibilidad existe, pero esta compra en definitiva ha sido de las mejores que he hecho cuando de un teléfono se trata. Hay motivos para arriesgarse a comprar acá. PD: Esta fue mi experiencia, no necesariamente será la de todas las compras de este tipo, pero a más común sea el dispositivo, más chance de que salga bien. El IPhone XS ha envejecido como buen vino.

El teléfono esta muy bien cuidado, la pantalla tiene un pequeo rayón que con una mica de cristal templado ya no se percibe, en la parte trasera el cristal está en perfectas condiciones, la condición de la batería venia al 100%, a 6 meses de la compra el teléfono sigue funcionando perfectamente, ninguna queja al respecto. 100% recomendable.

El teléfono llego súper rápido en buen estado en caja sellada genérica, la estética 10/10 ningún rasguo parece nuevo, venía con mica de cristal, la quite para ver si me encontraba con la sorpresa pero no, pantalla intacta. Batería al 84% no está mal, cargador y cable genérico, veré su funcionamiento en los próximos días.Lo único malo es que no estaba activado y tarde 3 horas conectado a mi Mac para instalar software

Al principio tenía miedo por muchos comentarios y experiencias, fue mi primera vez comprando un dispositivo reconstruido. Pero en definitiva todo ha salido mucho mejor de lo que esperaba.Batería 92% y tras un par de meses de uso, no ha bajado.Pantalla original, bocinas funcionando al 100%, conectividad con otros dispositivos iOS y Android súper bien, cámaras originales a las del iPhone XS, precio bastante adecuado para un dispositivo de 256gb.Bajo mi experiencia, recomendaría totalmente y muy probablemente my próxima compra de un dispositivo sea de la misma forma (sin buscar lo último, y con ese taste de riesgo que la verdad, es mínimo).Todo increíble

Solo vino con un pequeo detalle en el puerto de carga pero no es nada que afecte el rendimiento.La batería llegó al 84% pero sigue durando lo suficiente para un uso normal.La pantalla y el celular en general llegó sin rayones, casi en perfectas condiciones.El FaceID funciona a la perfección.

Me encantó, fue una excelente decisión al comprarlo trae una batería al 90% esta impecable la estética del equipo, estoy encantaday llegó super rápido mucho antes de lo estimado, ampliamente recomendable el proveedor.

Cumple con lo que prometen, tenía muchas dudas, sin embargo, estoy muy contento con la compra, ya lo he probado por 30 días y todo funciona perfecto.
Revise las calificaciones y la gente que le puso mala calificación por venir, con cargador genérico, caja genérica y batería menor al 90% debería haber puesto 5 estrellas también. Ya que eso no lo promete.Sin duda lo recomiendo.

El teléfono celular es perfecto muy bien cuidado sin detalles, lo único es que me tocó la de perder a mí por la razón de la condición de la batería, era demasiado baja lo cual no le rindió la batería ni un día de allí en fuera está bien si eres una persona que no lo forza a trabajar mucho lo recomiendo ..!!

I'm very pleased with my iPhone XS, the phone is in pristine condition, not a single scratch and fully functional. Shipping was fast. Battery is 83% but I'm okay with that. Bottom line, I wholeheartedly recommend this seller. Thank you!

Los detalles estéticos son mínimos, la capacidad de la pila apenas está por encima del 80%, aun así, rinde bastante bien. Veníaen caja genérica con su cargador genérico. Viene desbloqueado para cualquier compaía celular. Hasta ahorita ha funcionado a la perfección.
El celular venía en excelentes condiciones,sin rayones o golpes y muy bien empacado, me llegó con un 88% de batería, lo compré con MOBO, muy buen producto.

Fue al 2o intento, compré un primer cel y la pantalla resultó defectuosa, lo regresé el mismo día (lun) y para el jueves ya tenía reembolso, decidí darle una 2o oportunidad y todo perfecto, la batería llegó al 88 y estéticamente de 9.5. Buen vendedor BuySPRY.

Excelente producto, con la calidad de Apple, si bien es un producto reacondicionado, tuvieron todo el cuidado de darle una presentación excelente, hasta el momento el producto funciona bien. Lo recomiendo ampliamente

There are no signs that this phone is used other than the battery capacity (which was higher than expected). Not a single scratch or dent to be seen anywhere on the device. The buttons and touch screen function as expected. The phone overall functions as expected.

Won the awful lottery of having two phones with minor issues. Seller put in the time and effort to make sure number three was perfect.Anyone can have defective units through bad luck, but not everyone puts in the care and effort to make it right afterwards.

Tardo unos días en llegar el iPhone pero llegó en excelentes condiciones, estéticamente impecable, el funcionamiento al 100%, la batería está al 89% lo que es esperado y no sorprende porque es renovado, pero valió la pena la espera, recomendado 100 %

Tenía cierto miedo al pedirlo, en cierto punto es arriesgado por que no sabes cómo llegará pero wow! Quedé encantada con lo que recibí, el celular sellado, venía todo lo que especificaba el comprador, la pantalla venía con etiqueta de protección nueva y bueno, no tenía ni un rayón. Excelente compra.

column1: I’m pleased with this refurbished phone!!!!
column2: I’m very pleased with this phone.It has everything I wanted on a new phone but couldn’t afford.I didn’t want to be tied up for 2 years paying it off.Now I have a low monthly bill for service.Perfect for me.I’ll do it again.

El equipo esta como nuevo, en excelente estado, la bateria al 85% pero es de esperarse por un iPhone de hace 2 generaciones, el cargador y el cable son genericos, pero tengo originales en casa asi que no fue problema.
Muy recomendado el vendedor, llegó a tiempo y todo funcionando al 100%.

Recibí el celular hace una semana y hasta el momento no ha fallado NADA, se ve bien, se escucha bien, el touch funciona bien, no tiene rallones y sobre todo la capacidad máxima de la batería está al 100%. Sus accesorios pues genéricos, funcionando normal, por su precio y lo que recibí si recomiendo comprarlo, la verdad ya he comprado varios “reacondicionados” y nunca he tenido algún problema
Solo tieneunos pequeas raya en una esquina que no se nota la verdad ,excelente funciona ala perfección !!! Ya hemos comprado dos uno para mi marido y para mi estamos encantados !
No dents or scratches, like new. Battery lasts sufficiently all day when starting off fully charged.
El equipo parece totalmente nuevo, no tiene un solo rasguo, la batería viene aún al 91% de condición, excelentes condiciones

column1: Very happy to have found this!
column2: It was going to cost $500+ to have my daughter's iPhone case/ screen fixed. We found this one and we're very happy with it. Quick delivery- arrived sooner than expected. Phone is in perfect condition.

Me sorprendió lo bien que esta el equipo. Llego en excelentes condiciones sin golpes y batería al 84%. La batería le dura suficiente y el desempeo es excelente. Todos los sensores funcionan y no eh teido problemas tras un mes de uso.
Al ver que era rearmado pensé que tendría problemas pero al parecer ya funcionado súper bien y mi sobrino está encantado. Eso es genial. Espero que así siga funcionando.

El equipo me llego con muy buena estetica, me encanto apesar de ser un equipo de segunda mano esta aceptable me fascino cambie el aspecto de un iphone 6s a un XS la verdad sigo enamorada de estos equipos, la condicion de la bateria es de 80% pero me ha durado bastante y eso que e estado jugando corre muy bien el software muy rapido quedo satisfecha con mi compra y lo recomiendo ampliamente

Lo dudé mucho porque nunca había comprado nada renewed pero el hecho de que dieran garantía de 3 meses me animó y fue una excelente compra. Lo compré hace ya casi 7 meses y me ha funcionado súper bien, la batería me llegó con un 94% de vida útil y no tenía ni un rayón, realmente como nuevo. Hasta ahora estoy súper contenta con la compra

No estaba seguro qué tal estaría el equipo, pero Amazon como siempre cumpliendo con las más altas expectativas. El Equipo está en perfectas condiciones, ningún rayón, ningún golpe, me incluía un cable de buena longitud, un cubo, la herramienta para introducir el chip y el equipo tenía consigo una mica. Muchas gracias! Recomiendo totalmente la compra.

column1: Phone looks like new, so the battery life is the only  issue
column2: Quick shipping. Shipping and customs included in price. Phone looks like new. Only concern is the battery life which is part of the deal. Phone doesseemto get quite warm when charging.

column1: Screen looks like it’s changed with low grade screen
column2: Battery is at 90%, which is awesome. Software is also good, no issues there.The screen looks like it’s replaced with low grade screen, other than that, it’s great !
Bought this for my son for his bday!Wasn't sure what to expect for the price..it was in the next day. .10/10 condition..charged and better than expected.I'm glad I ordered here and he was so happy!

Excelente producto. Llego en perfecto estado prácticamente nuevo, ningún rayón hasta el momento o igual los que normalmente con el uso se hacen pero impecable sin duda lo compraría de nuevo solo que si estaría mejor que tuviera sus accesorios originales (aclaró que contiene cuadro y cable universal y un pincho para tarjeta sim)

column1: Looks and works like new. Battery capacity is 89%
column2: I was hesitant but this my phone came the next day. It really looks and work like new and has a battery capacity of 89%. I had to force restart it at first but since then it has been working well. I love the design. Good to reuse and reduce waste! Would recommend :)

Debo admitir que si tenia mucho miedo con la compra despues de ver algunos comentarios negativos, el celular llego al 100% esteticamente, no me deje llevar por eso lo revise y funcionaba todo correctamente, la bateria tenia una vida del 100% literal un celular nuevo, Recomiendo mucho este producto

Tenía duda de comprarlo porque veía comentarios negativos, pero tuve la fortuna que me llegó en excelentes condiciones, así que deduzco que los comentarios negativos son solo para hacerte dudar de tu compra y en realidad no son comentarios reales.

column1: Ganas mucho o pierdes mucho, tu decides
column2: Compré dos negros de 256 GB, uno salió muy bien y otro salió malEl que salió bien no ha tenido ningún problema hasta ahora, incluso se cayó desde un buró de ropa y no hubo problemaEl otro celular parecía que tenía una batería defectuosa porque no duraba nada la carga, estuve a punto de devolverlo pero como la pantalla, bocinas, micrófono y de estética estaba como nuevo, decidí ver hasta cuando podría aguantar antes de que eso me volviera loco; y resultó que con sólo una calibración de batería fue suficiente para que tuviera una duración aceptable, PEEEERO después empezó a suceder la razón de que me metiera a subir esta resea, el celular se me apagó de la nada una vez (probablemente ya pasado el tiempo de devolución), y desde entonces, de vez en cuando se apaga solo, lo correcto sería decir que se crashea y se reinicia y es MUY molesto y frustrante (y todo por andar comprando más barato).Así que, yo recomiendo que mejor te compres uno nuevo o directamente desde Apple Refurbished y así no te preocupas de nada, sabes que no estarás siendo estafado ni de un lado ni del otroO si tienes buena suerte, arriesgate y cómprate uno de estos, como dije, uno de los que compré está como nuevo y sin ningún problema de momento(No subo fotos porque qué flojera xd)
